item.description:
! ! ! Sorry to change the date at this late notice -- my husband has a work function and I have no babysitter. The meetup will move from Wed the 10th to Tues the 9th. ! ! !

The February Meetup will be held on **Tuesday, February 9th** from 7-8:30pm. Be sure to mark it on your calendar.

Grab a drink or meal (or nothing) and join us for some great conversation in French.

Tara
item.how_to_find_us: Check the back room first. I can't officially reserve the back room as we are not a large enough group but let's try to get the space anyway. I'll have a sign laying on the table.

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: FEBRUARY MEETUP
